import Video from "../../src/components/Video.js";
import Gist from "react-gist";

Open-source product roadmap app. Users can vote on features, add their feedback to get votes on features, and request features. 

Build a product that users want based on what they want

Database: Firebase
CMS: Rowy CMS for Firestore
Backend: Cloud functions built in low-code using Rowy
Frontend: Remix app
